title: View Add transaction button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the Payroll report is in Edit mode
custom_expected: THEN an "Add Transaction" button displayed beneath the Cash Transactions portion of the utility (see wire).

title: Click Add Transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Transaction
custom_expected: THEN a popup will launch that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction.

title: Add a transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed all required fields on the Add transaction Popup [C187387]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add transaction that becomes active only when all required fields have been completed
custom_expected: THEN the modal will close and populate the Cash Transaction table of BOTH the LRD and the CBT payroll report utility with the cash transaction information for the currently selected Org.

title: Check that counterpart of transaction is also added to the other org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully added a cash transaction to a payroll report 
AND for example if Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payroll report for ARI and BOS
custom_expected: THEN ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added

title: Reset manually changed values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has manually updated Player Details in a Payroll Report 
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Reset in a Player's row
custom_expected: THEN clicking the reset button will restore the originally calculated values to the Payroll details for the selected player.

title: Add Player to Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report 
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Player
custom_expected:
THEN a modal is launched that matches the wireframe 
AND the Player dropdown works like quicksearch

title: Player is added to CBT and LRD version of the report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has clicked Add player on a Payroll Report
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has filled out all required fields in the modal 
AND clicked Add Player
custom_expected: THEN  the player and the information added for him, are added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report.

title: Cancel Addition of player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Add Player on a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Cancel on the modal
custom_expected: THEN the modal will be dismissed and no player will be added to the report

title: Remove Player from Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trashcan icon
custom_expected:
THEN the player is flagged as being removed from the report 
AND the player will remain in the utility but be greyed out 
AND Return button appears where the trash can icon was

title: Save Removal of Player from Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has removed a player from the report [C187401]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN Deleted will appear in the "Manually Changed" column 
AND the player will appear in the utility but will NOT display in the actual report

title: Return a deleted player to the Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has removed a player from the report [C187402]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Return button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN the player and their information will be restored to the report
AND the row will no longer be greyed out

title: Save the return of a deleted player to the Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has returned a player that was previously deleted from a payroll report [C187404]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN the report is loaded in view mode 
AND Deleted will not appear in the "Manually Changed Column" 
AND the player will now display in the actual report and in the utility 
AND the row will no longer be greyed out

title: Cancel changes to payroll report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a payroll report in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user makes changes to the report and clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be asked to confirm they wish to lose any edits that have been made to the utility 
IF they confirm, any edits will be cancelled out and the report will load in view mode 
IF they do not confirm, THEN they will be returned to the report they were working on

title: View Close button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has generated a payroll report or is viewing an existing saved report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Close (only appears in view mode)
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken back to the original screen with all of the previously selected filters blanked out

title: LRD user views total LRD 40 Man Impact excluding cash transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Total LRD 40-Man Impact displays under the payroll section 
AND is recalculated on Save when updates are made to values in the table

title: LRD user views total CB Tax Impact excluding cash transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the CBT is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Total CB Tax Impact displays under the payroll section 
AND is recalculated on Save when updates are made to values in the table

title: View CB tax Payroll Cash Transaction details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN CBT is selected in the Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the Cash transaction section should match the wireframe 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: View LRD 40- Man Payroll Cash Transaction details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN LRD is selected in Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the Cash transaction section will match the wireframe 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: Access Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user (admin-boc-all) has clicked Major Contracts from left navigation
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Payroll Forecast tab that displays
custom_expected: THEN the utility will load and display the Yeah, Show, and Org dropdowns

title: Default Dropdowns for Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user first views the dropdowns
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdowns  should default as follows: 

1. Year dropdown has the current year and the next 10 years contained in the dropdown, and defaults to the following year. (Ex: Right now in 2016 it would start at 2016 and go out to 2026, but default to 2017). 
2. Show dropdown contains All Players and Manually Modified Only options, and defaults to "All Players". 
3. Org defaults to "All", and has All and each of the 30 Orgs as an option.

title: View Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects values for each dropdown 
AND clicks the activated View button
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load and display the selected criteria 
AND the top filters will remain editable with "View" button still enabled

title: View CB Tax Payroll Player details in the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a Payroll Forecast report
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects CBT in the show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the CB Tax Player details report values will load 
AND the Payroll section of the CB Tax Payroll Forecast will be displayed when the header is set to CBT

title: Layout detail when CBT is selected in Show
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Forecast Report
custom_steps:
WHEN CBT is selected in show drop down 
AND user is viewing CB Tax Player Details Report Values
custom_expected:
THEN Player name should be displayed as Last, First and should be a hyperlink to the player's player history. 
AND Payroll section should be sorted by player name (Last, First). 
AND Values in each column should be populated according to the report specifications pulled from ebis1.
AND Org should be the Org that the player's details are impacting for the report - not necessarily the Org that the player is currently affiliated with.  
AND guaranteed column only displays if MLS is < 3.000

title: View specific Org's LRD or CBT Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing Payroll Forecast report
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes the value of the Org column 
AND clicks View
custom_expected:
THEN the screen should refresh to display the data for the newly selected Org 
AND both the Payroll and Cash Transactions section will update to reflect the selected org

title: View LRD 40-Man Payroll Player details in Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a Payroll Forecast report
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects LRD in the show dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the screen will refresh and display the LRD values of the report

title: Payroll Re-Verification Batch
custom_steps: WHEN the Payroll Re-Verification batch is run in Update mode
custom_expected:
THEN all players that have a MJ Contract that is included in any of the current year's Payroll or CBT reports and uncheck the LRD verified checkbox for the last As of Date for the contract 
AND an approval item should be generated for each affected contract

title: Sort Error Column in Batches
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing batch results widget for any batch
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the error icon in Batch Results
custom_expected: THEN the column should sort just like the other columns

title: Receive Warning adding or editing an As of Date that is already used
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is adding or editing an as of date
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Apply
custom_expected:
THEN the system with check that the new As of Date does not already exist for the contract being viewed 
IF it does then display an error and return the user to the date popup after they dismiss the popup
